Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Citadines Place d'Italie Paris, you'll be centrally located in Paris, convenient to Pitie-Salpetriere Hospital and Notre Dame Cathedral. This residence is within close proximity of Jardin des Plantes and Grande Galerie de l'Evolution.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 169 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this residence consist of conference space and meeting rooms.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Pitie-Salpetriere Hospital - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Jardin des Plantes - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Grande Galerie de l'Evolution - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Halle Georges Carpentier - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Ecole normale superieure - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Paris Observatory - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
National Library - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Menagerie du Jardin des Plantes - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Gallery of Comparative Anatomy and Paleontology - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Parc Montsouris - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Arenes de Lutece - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Place de la Contrescarpe - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Cite Internationale Universitaire de Paris - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Paris Catacombs - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Place Denfert-Rocherau - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi

The preferred airport for Citadines Place d'Italie Paris is Paris (ORY-Orly) - 11 km / 6.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Citadines Apart'hotel Paris Place d'Italie is Paris (ORY-Orly) - 11 km / 6.8 mi.
